author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chennai District Election Officers will conduct special camps to enrol first-time voters in 33 colleges in the district next week.

On Monday, camps would be conducted at Dr. Ambedkar Government Arts College, Vysarpadi, KCS Kasi Nadar Arts and Science College, R.K.Nagar, Sir Theagaraya College, Old Washermenpet, Muthukumaraswamy College, Kodungaiyur, Thirutangal Nadar College, Kodungaiyur, and Barathi Women’s College, Prakasam Salai.

On Tuesday, camps would be organised at New College, Royapettah, Presidency College, Chepauk, Quaid-E-Millath Government College for Women , Anna Salai, Sri Kannika Parameswari Women’s Science College, Anna Salai, Queen Mary’s College and Bakthavatsalam Memorial College, Korattur.

On Wednesday, students of Kandasamy Naidu College, Anna Nagar, DG Vaishnav College, Arumbakkam, Pachaiyappas College, Valliammal College, Anna Nagar East, and Loyola College, Nungambakkam, would be covered .

On Thursday, election officials would visit MOP Vaishnav College, Nungambakkam, Ramakrishna Mission Vivekananda College, Mylapore, Stella Maris College, Women’s Christian College, Nungambakkam, Meenakshi College, Kodambakkam, and AA Arts and Science College, Koyambedu, for organising the camps.

On Friday, JBAS College, Teynampet, Kumararani Meena Muthiah College, Adyar, St.Louis College, Adyar, Annai Velankanni College, West Saidapet, Dr.MGR Janaki College, Adyar, and Guru Sree Santhivijay Jain College, Vepery, would be covered in the drive, the release said.

Students above 18 will be able to enrol themselves at the camps in their own colleges
title: Poll panel to enlist new electors at 33 colleges
